Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
1B John Tamplin, MR Samuel Hidalgo
in return for
2B Dan Lilley.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Boston (FBA) GM

Date: Tuesday, 5/20/1987
Subject: Status of Phillip Gephart
Dear Sir,
Phillip Gephart isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Patriot Games!
He has an AVG of .249, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/24/1987
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Scott Wiltshire

I'd like to complain about my playing time, I think

Deon Castillo
